caption.title: Ensemble mean precipitation differences.
caption.p: Results (in mm per day) are shown for change along ( a) the fast (high-forcing) and ( b) the mitigation routes to a first 2 K; and ( c) their difference (scale for c is half that of a, b). ( d) Differences for the second 2 K; ( e) the second 2 K minus the first 2 K under mitigation conditions (note different scale in c). ( f) The second 2 K divided by the first 2 K under mitigation conditions. ( g) as ( f) but using data from RCP8.5 only. ( h) as ( f) but for the 1pctCO2 experiment.
